article_title: Plant City cancels monthly food truck rallies
article_text:
PLANT CITY The city has canceled monthly food truck rallies that have been held since May in McCall Park.

The Plant City Food Truck Round Up was established to help bring visitors into downtown. More details on the cancelation weren’t immediately available.

City Manager David Sollenberger recently announced that city special events manager Deanna Hurley would be laid off effective Oct. 1 to save money in the city budget. Hurley helped organize the food truck rallies.
